tool_description: Creates a comprehensive comparison matrix of features and specifications across multiple bathroom fixture products.

product_ids.description: List of product IDs to include in comparison matrix

comparison_categories.description: Specific categories to compare: dimensions, materials, features, efficiency, style

weighting_priority.description: Priority weighting: price, quality, features, efficiency

error_messages: Insufficient products: At least 2 products required for meaningful comparison
Too many products: Maximum 6 products can be compared in a single matrix
Invalid comparison category: Use categories from [dimensions, materials, features, efficiency, style]
Invalid weighting priority: Use one of [price, quality, features, efficiency]
usage: Provide product_ids for comparison. Specify comparison_categories to focus on relevant aspects and weighting_priority for scoring.

comparison_scores.description: Array of overall comparison scores from 1-100 for each product

feature_summaries.description: Array of key feature summaries for each product

best_in_category.description: Array of product IDs that excel in each comparison category

overall_winner.description: Product ID of the highest-scoring product overall
